settings.title: Flexfilm
settings.subheading: See how we stack up against the competition

settings.text:
Have you noticed that most people try to talk you into buying their products? We like to do things a little differently. We want to SHOW you how our products stack up against our competition‚Ä¶you can draw the conclusions yourself.¬†

That‚Äôs exactly why we started creating our comparison videos! We use a heat box and a few other nifty tools to demonstrate how good our film is.

If we could grab your hand through the screen and put it in front of the heat box so you can feel the difference, we‚Äôd do that too, by the way!

Below is a collection of videos to show you how we stack up against our competition.

settings.code:
See how we compare

Click below to watch a comparison video

settings.text:
‚ÄúWhat's the point of this video? A car is going to sit hours under the sun. Not 4 or 6 or 40 seconds... Let's see a video that a car sitting under the sun for 4 hours, and is 20 degree F lower than the competition. Otherwise I am not sure what this tells us. It heats up 35 seconds slower, so?? I am not affiliated with any tint maker nor do I sell tints. I am a consumer trying to get a good quality product.‚Äú

- Matt, professional keyboard warrior

‚ÄúI think you are missing the point.¬† A yeti cooler doesn't get you drinks colder than an igloo cooler... the yeti cooler keeps the drinks cooler longer than the igloo cooler because it has more insulation.¬†If you leave a car in the sun for 4 hours without running the air conditioning, the law of thermal equilibrium says the inside temperature will be the same as the outside temperature no matter what film you have on the glass.¬† What our film will do is slow down the heat from re-radiating into the car slow enough to allow the climate control to work less maintaining the desired temperature better than the competition.‚Äù

settings.title: Carbon
settings.text: Terraflex allows you to hold the smoking gun against your competitors slinging dyed tint by simply blocking more solar energy and never fading and changing color.

settings.title: Entry-Level Ceramic
settings.text: Built on top of our best-selling carbon film, Panaflex is our entry-level ceramic window tint designed to slow down the heat and stop harmful solar energy.

settings.title: Premium Ceramic
settings.text: Nanoflex adds function to style by keeping the heat and harmful solar energy outside while maintaining a cool and comfortable interior.

settings.title: High Performance Carbon
settings.text: Terraflex HP is a unique blend of carbon and metallized technology that creates the world's first high performance carbon window tint.

settings.title: Want To Increase Your Profit
settings.text: Want to double or even triple the profitability of your tinting business.

settings.title: Want To Get Ahead
settings.text: Want to get ahead of your competition and win the bid.

settings.title: Want Quality & Value
settings.text: Are focused on quality and value, rather than brand recognition alone.

settings.title: Want Happy Customers
settings.text: Want to make your customers happy (and keep them that way with products that don‚Äôt fail).

settings.title: Are tired of problems
settings.text: Are tired of dealing with recurring problems such as bubbling tint caused by adhesive failure, changes in tint color, fading, installation difficulties etc.

settings.title: Want To Stress Less
settings.text: Want to stress less about keeping the shop running smoothly and enjoy the things that made you become an entrepreneur in the first place!
